NGLOF.description: You materialize in a spot with four portals, one in each direction. Your view past the portals is blocked by large amounts of old theme park rides.
NGLOF.name: NG's LAND-O-FUN

Borg.description: A cyborg is right beside you. It continues along regardless, almost as though it didn't notice you.
Borg.name: Unimatrix 1f
